content: Excellent news, Rohan. The official report confirms your ApoB is 78 mg/dL. You’ve officially met and exceeded our Q2 target. Your hs-CRP is also down 50% from baseline. This is a direct result of your consistency.
That’s fantastic, Warren 🙌. A big relief to see the numbers moving the right way. Thanks to you and the team for getting me here.
Congratulations, Rohan 🎉. We’re really proud of the progress you’ve made. Would you like me to prepare a short milestone summary for your records?
Yes, please. That’d be useful for me and also something I can share with my wife. Thanks Ruby.
This milestone is a keystone, Rohan. It validates the model we co-created. From here, we can safely expand into new performance layers with confidence.
Agreed, Neel. Which brings me to Q3—I’d like to propose an experiment of my own.
I’ve been reading about ketogenic diets improving mental clarity. Let’s run a strict 2-week keto protocol and track the impact on my daily focus scores.
Love that initiative 👏. I’ll loop Carla and Advik right away so we can design the framework together.
Perfect example of Stage 3 partnership, Rohan. You’re taking the reins, and we’ll structure the support system around you.
Exciting. I’ll set up tracking for your focus scores, CGM, and HRV during the 2-week keto window. We’ll compare both subjective logs and objective data.
Great. I’ll make sure to record notes on my focus daily. Short entries are fine, right?
Exactly. A quick 1–10 rating on focus, plus a brief line on your energy levels, will do the trick.
Rohan, this is a perfect opportunity to baseline your gut microbiome. Significant dietary changes like keto can shift its composition. We can run a simple at-home gut health test before you start.

Interesting… so the microbiome is another variable in the flywheel. Does an altered microbiome have downstream effects on inflammation or neurotransmitter production that could explain cognitive changes?

Exactly. The gut-brain axis is bidirectional—microbial metabolites can influence inflammation, stress response, and neurotransmitters like GABA and serotonin. Capturing this now gives us a unique layer of data.
Makes sense. Let’s add it in. Data is data 👍.
I’ll arrange the gut microbiome test kit delivery this week. It’s a simple home swab—takes 10 minutes. Would you prefer it sent to your office or home?
Home is better—easier to slot in. Sarah can handle the receipt.
Confirmed—kit will reach your residence by Wednesday. I’ll send Javier’s meal guidelines once Carla finalizes the keto protocol.
Thanks Ruby. That covers logistics nicely.
Drafting your 2-week keto experiment protocol now. It’ll include meal plans, shopping lists, and notes for Javier on hidden carbs to avoid.
Perfect. That’ll make it easy to execute without thinking too much.
Rohan, quick check-in: with keto, hydration and electrolytes are important. During your morning runs, let’s keep sodium and magnesium topped up. I’ll share a simple routine.
Noted, Rachel. Please send the details—I’ll make sure Javier stocks the right supplements.
Hi Rohan, courier confirms your gut microbiome kit is out for delivery today. I’ll ping once it’s signed for.
Kit delivered and received by Sarah ✅.
Great, I’ll plan to do the swab tomorrow morning before meetings.
I’ve set up your data dashboard for the experiment. It’ll show daily focus logs, CGM readings, and HRV. You’ll get a weekly snapshot from me.
Excellent. A clean dashboard will help me stick to the protocol.
Completed the microbiome swab this morning. Packed and ready for courier pickup.
Thanks for confirming, Rohan. Courier scheduled for 10am today. I’ll track it till lab receipt.
Final version of your keto protocol is ready ✅. Document includes meal breakdowns, Javier’s checklist, and supplement notes. Sharing via PDF in the app now.
Just skimmed—this looks thorough, Carla. Thanks for covering all the details.
Lab has confirmed receipt of your gut microbiome kit. Results usually take 10–14 days. I’ll keep you posted.
Perfect timing—we’ll have results alongside the keto experiment wrap-up.
This week shows the real evolution of your journey: from following to leading experiments. It’s a strong signal of maturity in the program.
Appreciate that, Neel. I like feeling more in control of the levers now.
All logistics complete: test kit sent, protocol delivered, dashboard live. You’re ready to start keto from Monday if that works for you.
Monday works. Gives Javier the weekend to stock up. Let’s go 👍.
Fantastic. I’ll set a Monday morning reminder for the experiment kick-off. Enjoy your weekend, Rohan 🌟.
